definition: the middle part of a slack rope (as distinguished from its ends), to fasten with a loop of rope
details:
noun
- the middle part of a slack rope (as distinguished from its ends)
- a broad bay formed by an indentation in the shoreline
- a bend or curve (especially in a coastline)
- a loop in a rope
verb
- to fasten with a loop of rope
= example: to fasten with a loop of rope
